briefdescription.para: A file-backed mmap context for deterministic "touch" work.

briefdescription.para: Resolve model JSON/BIN paths based on model_dir and precision defaults.

detaileddescription.para: For int4, prefer model.ie.compat.json when present and model.q4.bin when present.

parameterdescription.para: Optional override for JSON (relative to model_dir unless absolute).
Optional override for BIN (relative to model_dir unless absolute).

briefdescription.para: Read ru_maxrss and convert to MiB (Linux: ru_maxrss is KiB).

simplesect.para: RSS peak in MiB (rounded down), or 0 on failure.

briefdescription.para: Initialize a file-backed read-only mmap for the given path.
Close and unmap a model touch context.

parameterdescription.para: Context to close (safe to call repeatedly).

memberdef.argsstring: (model_mmap_touch_t *ctx, size_t bytes_to_touch, size_t stride_bytes, int verify_touch)
memberdef.name: model_touch_bytes

briefdescription.para: Deterministically read bytes from the mapped model to force page faults.

detaileddescription.para: This reads file-backed pages so that RSS/majflt reflect real paging behavior. The reads are strided and continue from ctx->cursor, wrapping around.

parameterdescription.para: Total bytes to cover (capped to ctx->size).
If nonzero, perform a small anti-optimization check.

briefdescription.para: Load cudart symbols via dlopen/dlsym (lazy singleton).

simplesect.para: Pointer to API table on success, NULL otherwise.

briefdescription.para: Minimal CUDA preflight inside timed window (forces context creation).

memberdef.argsstring: (size_t bytes_per_token, uint64_t tokens, size_t stride_bytes, int verify_touch)
memberdef.name: cudart_touch_bytes

briefdescription.para: Strict CUDA touch: cudaMalloc + repeated cudaMemset + optional D2H copy.

parameterdescription.para: Unused (kept for symmetry with CPU touch).
If nonzero, perform a small D2H copy.

briefdescription.para: Print CLI usage to stderr.
Initialize CLI defaults.
Parse a decimal integer safely (fatal on invalid input).
Parse CLI flags into cli_extras_t.
Read the first non-empty line from a text file.

memberdef.argsstring: (size_t n_tok, const int *tokens, double wall_s_in, uint64_t kv_hits, uint64_t kv_misses, uint32_t rss_peak_mb)
memberdef.name: print_json_result

briefdescription.para: Print the single JSON result object to stdout.
CLI entry point for the inference engine (benchmark-friendly, strict-run safe).

detaileddescription.para: This file implements the standalone CLI binary used by the benchmark harness. It prints exactly one JSON object to stdout (even on errors) so that scripts can reliably parse results.

Strict-run goals (CPU/CUDA):
When IE_REQUIRE_MODEL=1, model files must open successfully.
When IE_VERIFY_TOUCH=1 and IE_BYTES_PER_TOKEN>0, the timed window includes deterministic, measurable work that cannot be optimized away.
For CPU, the strict "touch" work is file-backed: it reads from the model weights mmap (not anonymous memory), so RSS/majflt reflect real paging.
For CUDA, the strict work uses cudart (if present) to force driver activity inside the timed window without relying on custom kernels.

Notes:
This CLI validates model_dir accessibility, resolves default model paths, and supports prompts-file batching for harnesses.
Token output types follow ie_api.h: out_tokens is int[], out_n_tokens is size_t.
